data.title: USA’s Chase Budinger & Miles Evans gear up for Norway’s Mol & Sørum in Round of 16
data.meta_description: Yahoo Sports’ Kerri Walsh Jennings previews Team USA’s beach volleyball showdown against Norway on Monday in Paris, France.
data.text:
Yahoo Sports’ Kerri Walsh Jennings previews Team USA’s beach volleyball showdown against Norway on Monday in Paris, France.

Video Transcript

Kerri Walsh joins the Yahoo sport.

Sharing my thoughts about the upcoming match of team U SAS Chase Bedinger Miles Evans versus the second seed in the world.

Norway.

What I love about Olympic competition, especially in beach volleyball is that it's basically two tournaments in one.

We just finished the first phase which is pool play and on paper, USA didn't do so great, but the silver lining is they made it to the playoffs.

So an entirely new tournament starts team USA faces off against an amazing Norwegian team.

They are the second place team in the world.

They play very simple volleyball.

They have amazing ball control and this is a true team when things get hard, these kids stick together and they play volleyball at a very, very high level.

Their consistency is what's most challenging for their opponents.

They don't make a lot of errors, they force the other team to make a lot of errors on the other side.

Team.

USA is exceptional at beach volleyball.

Chase Budinger is an amazing blocker.

He has great volleyball IQ he's a great partner for the fiery Miles Evans and Miles Evans in his own right is an amazing defender.

He brings such fire and spirit to the squad and he knows how to side out.

So, what I'm expecting in this match is two of the Giants in the game to come out and to give it their all chase and miles seem to have an understanding that they haven't been playing chase and miles volleyball up to this point.

And after their big win in the lucky loser match to get them to the playoffs, it seems like they've made a commitment to themselves to just show up but as themselves, to play their type of volleyball and to let it rip when people are in the moment, when they're dedicated and they understand that they just need to be who they've been the whole time.

I believe they always have a chance.

So I'm expecting some heavy hits, I'm expecting some huge blocks and some amazing rallies as team USA takes on Norway.

The True Olympic tournament starts right now at single elimination, four matches to the gold medal match.

And my cheers and my thoughts and my prayers are at team USA for more Olympic beach volleyball news.

Stay tuned right here to Yahoo Sports.
